sections.title: Basic Crafting Examples
sections.text:
This page demonstrates various crafting techniques and recipes from different crafting systems. Each example shows how the different crafting stations work together to create useful items.

The [[entry:crafting_table:crafting table]] is used for basic item creation, while specialized stations like the [[entry:furnace:furnace]] and [[entry:brewing_stand:brewing stand]] handle specific types of processing. Understanding these differences helps you choose the right tool for each crafting task.

sections.title: Crafting System Integration
sections.text:
These examples demonstrate how different crafting systems work together. The [[entry:crafting_table:crafting table]] creates the basic stations, which then process materials for use in more advanced crafting.

For example, the crafting table creates the [[entry:furnace:furnace]], which smelts ores into ingots. These ingots are then used by the [[entry:smithing_table:smithing table]] to create enhanced equipment. This progression system provides clear goals and rewards for mastering each crafting system.

Explore the [[category:crafting_systems:Crafting Systems]] category to learn more about each individual station and how they can be optimized for your specific needs.
